definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
Hong Kong, abbr. for 香港[Xiang1 gang3]/surname Gang

sentences.english: You can fish in the harbors of Kowloon, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kwun Tong or the Hong Kong Island.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在港口魚九龍尖沙咀或觀塘香港島。

sentences.english: Tathong Channel, seen at dawn beyond a Hong Kong Island headland.
sentences.chinese: 黎明時份，香港島一個岬角對開的藍塘海峽美景。

sentences.english: How many street lamps are there on Hong Kong and Lamma islands?
sentences.chinese: 目前港燈於香港島及南丫島上合共有超過多少支街燈？

sentences.english: You stay at a very new hotel in the heart of Hong Kong island.
sentences.chinese: 你將下塌在位於香港島中心的一座新賓館內。

sentences.english: Jackie attended the opening ceremony for the Island Golf Club on Hong Kong Island today.
sentences.chinese: 成龍大哥今天出席了香港島高爾夫俱樂部的開幕儀式。

sentences.english: Victoria Harbor is the natural harbor between the Kowloon Peninsula and the Hong Kong Island.
sentences.chinese: 維多利亞港是九龍半島和香港島之間的天然良港。

definition: Saigon, capital of former South Vietnam/Sai Kung town in New Territories, Hong Kong
Hong Kong Island/abbr. for 香港島|香港岛[Xiang1 gang3 dao3]
Wan Chai district of Hong Kong
Tsuen Wan district of New Territories, Hong Kong
Tuen Mun district of New Territories, Hong Kong
